projectGridLines.stationName: Sundial Systems Pvt. Ltd. - Data Science
projectGridLines.title: Data Science Models for Product Insights
projectGridLines.description:
Description:

- Work on enhancements / projects around Sundial Data Science models for deep product insights.

- These are the core data science / Analytics models which power the deep insights and narratives which Sundial generates.

- The work would involve developing and implementing these Data Science models on large scale product and user data.

- You would get to work with Industry veterans in Data Science and work on cutting edge Product Data Science and ML models

 

Skill sets: Knowledge in below areas is a plus: Data Science and ML Models, Python, Go, Pandas, Pyspark, Big Data Processing,

Expected learning: Data Science and ML Models, Python, Pandas, Pyspark, Big Data Processing,
